name: Splonk!
description:
Splonk is a game about fending off waves of aliens. Use several weapons to blast through creatures from another planet and secure the space base. There are two maps, three weapons, eight upgrades, and several enemies!

How to Play:

  • WASD to move
  • Left mouse to shoot
  • 1, 2, 3 to swap weapons
  • Press E to open and close the upgrades shop
  • Collect blops to spend on upgrades!
  • Find powerups to help you out of sticky situations!

Planned Features:

  • Boss fights at the end of the game
  • Difficulty levels
  • More unique weapons, like a grenade launcher
  • More maps

Splonk is currently in beta. Some features may be incomplete. The game ends after five waves, so enjoy the demo and let me know what you think! Thanks a lot!
